ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that He created the two sexes - male and female -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That He created pairs, male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and He it is Who created the two kinds, the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has created spouses, male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that it is He Who has created the two pairs, male and female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that He creates the pairs, male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that He created pairs, the male and the female
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that He Himself created the two kinds, male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that He createth the two spouses, the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and that He Himself created the two sexes: male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that He createth the pair, the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that it is He who created the mates, the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That He did create in pairs,- male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that He (Allah) creates the pairs, male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that it is He who created pairs, the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that it is He who created the two kinds—the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:45] and that He [Himself] creates the two spouses, the two kinds, the male and the female,
